text:
Haha glad you had a good time :blush::blush: well I did rest a lot for the last month of summer tho :joy::joy: tried to get as much energy as possible before starting uni again

It's been mainly inductions and things like that at uni so nothing too crazy yet :sweat_smile:

BFX is the animstion festival in Bournemouth it is a huge thing and the biggest studios come down to Bournemouth to talk about a film/show/game. Today we have 3 talks from framestore :blush: so that's very exciting!
It goes from Tuesday to Friday and then the weekend is por masterclasses :blush::blush:
